name: Spoiler Alert (itch)
description:
Hello! This is my first game ever!

This was started for a game jam about a month ago, yet life got in the way so I was unable to finish it. Now I've come back to complete it!

Please keep in mind that this is my first game -- so don't judge it too harshly! I'm sure I'll get better with experience!

Controls:
Arrow keys or WASD to move
Spacebar to swing the bat

Credits where due:

Music:

Main menu music: Woodpecker’s Delight - Quarter Roll

Game music: Dance to My Tune - Marc Torch

Additional SFX:

Trainscough5407

Soughtaftersounds

 MAJ061785
